full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Canadian Coast Guard Ship Amundsen Refit - Fall 2023
#### Request for Proposal (RFP)
---

**Solicitation Information**

* **ITB ( Invitation to Bid)** Number: WS4266910751
* **Reference Number**: WS4266910751-Doc4266978854
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Type of Contract**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Project Overview**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) invites eligible bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of ship repair services for the Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Amundsen. The proposed services will be carried out in Quebec, QC.

**Key Dates**

* **Publication Date**: October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2023 (2:00 PM ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: November 10, 2024

**Solicitation Details**

* **UNSPSC Codes**:
	+ Commercial marine craft
	+ Icebreaker
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Quebec

**Contracting Entity and Contact Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: PWGSC on behalf of CCG
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact Person**: Simoneau, Steve (he/him)
* **Email**: [steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17797717?extsite=MTc3OTc3MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Proposal Requirements and Evaluation Criteria**

Please refer to the solicitation document for further details.

This tender announcement includes all relevant information for potential bidders and can be accessed through the provided Notice URL. 

Please ensure you review the full RFP before responding.
